programme.desc: Monica Puig (PUE) v Angelique Kerber (GER) 6/4 4/6 6/1

programme.title: Women's Tennis Singles Final | Seoul 1988 | Great Olympic Moments
programme.desc: Relive one of the greatest Olympic Moments in tennis and join us at the Seoul Summer Olympic Games in 1988 as Steffi Graf wins gold for West Germany in the women's tennis singles final over Gabriela Sabatini from Argentina

programme.title: Women’s Football Final, Sydney 2000
programme.desc: In its second Olympic appearance, Norway's stars are pitted against the USA, consistently the dominant nation in women’s football.

programme.title: Women’s Triathlon, London 2012
programme.desc: Witness the closest final in Olympic triathlon history. An unbelievable finish between a world-class field of ladies.

programme.title: The Women's Teams
programme.desc: Skiing isn’t just an individual sport. The world’s best teams come together to push and support each other when the training starts.

programme.title: Women's Individual Epee Final | Rio 2016 | Great Olympic Moments
programme.desc: Emese Szasz wins the Gold for Hungary and Rossella Fiamingo the Silver for Italy in the women's individual epee final at the Rio Summer Olympic Games in 2016

programme.title: Women's Taekwondo -57kg Final | London 2012 | Great Olympic Moments
programme.desc: Relive one of the greatest Olympic Moments from the London Summer Olympic Games in 2012 and watch as Jade Jones wins gold for the host Great Britain in the women's taekwondo featherweight final. Hou Yuzhuo from China takes home silver

programme.desc: 16-year-old Navajo boxer Mariah Bahe is fighting against all odds to become the first female Native American Olympic boxer.

programme.title: USA v JPN - Women's Gold Medal Match | London 2012 Replays
programme.desc: The women's Gold Medal Match took place on 09/08/2012 at the Wembley Stadium, London. The United States claimed the Gold medal with a 2:1 victory over Japan

programme.title: The Magnificent 7, USA Women's Soccer, and Atlanta's enduring Olympic legacy
programme.desc: Twenty years on, we relish in Magnificent 7’s legacy with Shannon Miller and Kyla Ross, and remember the miracle birth of Centennial Park.

programme.title: Women's Hammer Final | Rio 2016 | Great Olympic Moments
programme.desc: Anita Wlodarczyk wins the Gold for Poland, Zhang Wenxiu the Silver for China and Sophie Hitchon the Bronze for Great Britain in the women's hammer final at the Rio Summer Olympic Games in 2016

programme.title: Norway's Women's Handball Victory in Beijing 2008
programme.desc: The result of Norway's exhilarating Olympic handball semi-final against South Korea at Beijing 2008 was decided in the game's final seconds.

programme.desc: The United States overcome home side Australia 76-54 in the women's basketball gold medal match at Sydney 2000.
